definition: Dengta county level city in Liaoyang 遼陽|辽阳[Liao2 yang2], Liaoning

sentences.english: St. Joseph lighthouse after a winter storm.
“Yeah, like a beacon in a fog-bound channel, ” I said.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，像在雲遮霧罩的海峽中看見燈塔。

sentences.english: Books are lighthouses erected in the great sea of time.
sentences.chinese: 是在時間的汪洋大海中屹然矗立的燈塔。

sentences.english: 110111You're calling him a beacon of social democracy, with a straight face?
sentences.chinese: 你繃着臉稱他爲社會民主主義的燈塔？

sentences.english: See one of the most beautiful lighthouses on the next page.
sentences.chinese: 下頁請看一座最美麗的燈塔。

sentences.english: Hundreds of moths flew against the lighthouse windows.
sentences.chinese: 數以千計的飛蛾撲向燈塔的窗子。

sentences.english: Without ideal as the lighthouse, even the best steersman will get lost.
sentences.chinese: 沒有理想的燈塔，再好的舵手也會迷失航向。

sentences.english: Let faith be your cynosure to walk by .
sentences.chinese: 讓信仰成爲你生活中的燈塔。

sentences.english: This beacon of sophisticated hospitality rises on the legendary Corniche along the bank of the river.
sentences.chinese: 這種複雜的好客的燈塔上升對沿河岸傳奇濱海路。

sentences.english: Shawn and Walt were around the front of the church looking at the bell tower while I was exploring the back area.
sentences.chinese: 肖恩和沃爾特在教堂前部檢查燈塔而我在後面察看。

sentences.english: The light flashed out from the little lighthouse.
sentences.chinese: 那座小燈塔閃耀出燈光。

sentences.english: In the picture Clare is looking out serenely overLighthouse Beach.
sentences.chinese: 在照片上，克萊爾正安靜的看着遠處沙灘上的燈塔。

sentences.english: You're calling him a beacon of social democracy, with a straight face?
sentences.chinese: 你繃着臉稱他爲社會民主主義的燈塔？

sentences.english: Portland Head is one of the most frequently visited lighthouses in America.
sentences.chinese: 波特蘭前燈塔是美國遊覽人數最多的燈塔了。

sentences.english: Portland Head is one of the most frequently visited lighthouses in America.
sentences.chinese: 波特蘭前燈塔是美國遊覽人數最多的燈塔了。

sentences.english: The lighthouse is an important mark for pilots.
sentences.chinese: 第三句是講海中的燈標的，詞義應當是“燈塔”。

definition: Victoria Harbor, Hong Kong/abbr. for 維多利亞港|维多利亚港[Wei2 duo1 li4 ya4 Gang3]
